_meta.source: Researched from Hawaii tourism, Hawaii Volcanoes NPS, and cruise guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers downtown Hilo, waterfalls, and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park

transit_routes.name: Walk to Downtown
transit_routes.note: Downtown Hilo and farmers market within walking distance of cruise dock.

transit_routes.name: Volcano Excursion
transit_routes.note: Ship excursions or rental car. 45-minute drive each way. Full day recommended.

featured_experiences.name: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park
featured_experiences.note: Active volcano! Crater Rim Drive, Thurston Lava Tube. Check eruption status. Unforgettable experience.

featured_experiences.name: Waterfall Tour
featured_experiences.note: Rainbow Falls free and close. Akaka Falls 30 min north. Stunning waterfalls!

featured_experiences.name: Downtown Hilo
featured_experiences.note: Authentic Hawaiian town. Famous market Wed & Sat. Walking distance from ship.
